gw.api.database.upgrade

Class DropColumnsButNotPropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.database.upgrade.DropColumnsAndDeletePropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange
      • gw.api.database.upgrade.DropColumnsButNotPropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatamodelChange<BeforeUpgradeVersionTrigger>

    public class DropColumnsButNotPropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange
extends DropColumnsAndDeletePropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange
    Checks that the given columns on the given table are safe to drop, i.e. for each column: - it is not defined in the datamodel, and - it only contains the default value given If the column is defined in the datamodel, the column is not dropped. If the column is not defined in the datamodel and has only default values, the column is dropped. If the column is not defined in the datamodel and has non-default values, a version check error is thrown. Works in tandem with DropColumnsIfSafeVersionCheck. This IDatamodelChange does not affect the archived document.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class gw.api.database.upgrade.DropColumnsAndDeletePropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange
